pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Install`pip install ez_yaml`# Use```pythonimport ez_yaml# to_string(obj, options={})ez_yaml.to_string({"thing": 1, "abc": [ 1,2,3 ]})# to_object(file_path, options={})# to_object(string , options={})ez_yaml.to_object(string='''thing: 1abc: - 1 - 2 - 3''')# to_file(obj, file_path, options={})ez_yaml.to_file( {"thing": 1, "abc": [ 1,2,3 ]}, file_path="./my_file.yaml",)
